patthana15.5:4.1: Hetuṃ saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.5:5.1: Nahetuṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nanahetu naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
patthana15.5:6.1: Hetuṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā ….
